jobDescription: Locations: Gurgaon | Bengaluru
Who We Are:
Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities.
Founded in 1963, BCG pioneered business strategy and continues to drive growth, competitive advantage, and impact.
BCG's global teams blend digital and human capabilities, bringing diverse expertise to create change.
We offer solutions through management consulting, technology, corporate ventures, and business strategy.
BCG works collaboratively across all levels of the client organization, driving sustainable results.
What You'll Do:
Collaborate with consulting teams on advanced analytics projects across industries.
Apply analytics methodologies to deliver insights and subject matter expertise.
Gather requirements, design, develop, and support analytics solutions for clients.
Provide technical support to ensure high-quality and efficient solutions.
You're Good At:
Working with case (and proposal) teams.
Acquiring deep expertise in analytics topics and understanding all capabilities.
Delivering original insights and managing analytics modules.
Establishing credibility through thought leadership.
Synthesizing insights into presentations, reports, dashboards, and charts.
Maintaining repositories for sanitized documents and internal references.
Leading workstreams independently or with minimal supervision.
Supporting business development through proposals and marketing collateral.
Guiding junior team members and ensuring quality in analytical work.
Contributing to team content and intellectual property development.
Imparting technical training to team members and consulting cohorts.
Technical Skills:
Strong proficiency in statistics: hypothesis testing, sampling, and statistical interpretation.
Hands-on data mining and predictive modeling: Linear Regression, K-means, DBSCAN, Random Forest, SARIMAX.
Experience with cloud platforms: Azure, AWS, GCP; knowledge of SageMaker and Azure ML.
Programming: Python (mandatory), SQL, R, SAS, or PySpark.
Visualization tools: Tableau, QlikView, Power BI, Streamlit.
Data management: Alteryx, MS Access, or any RDBMS.
ML Deployment: Airflow, MLflow, Luigi, Docker.
Big Data: Hadoop, Spark.
Data Warehousing: Teradata, Synapse, Redshift, BigQuery.
Version Control: Git, GitHub, GitLab.
Office tools: Excel, PowerPoint, Word.
Coding IDE: VS Code, PyCharm.
GenAI tools: OpenAI, Google PaLM/BERT, Hugging Face.
Functional Skills:
Building analytics solutions that deliver measurable business value.
Expertise in price optimization, promotion effectiveness, and product assortment optimization.
Experience with sales force effectiveness and loyalty programs.
Proficiency in labor optimization and customer lifecycle management (CLM).
Skills in revenue enhancement: segmentation, cross-sell, up-sell, offer recommendations, loyalty programs, LTV maximization, and churn prevention.
1+ years of data analytics or automation experience
Knowledge of data pipelining and extraction using SQL
Knowledge of SQL and Excel at a moderate or advanced level

description: Strong experience in backend development and API design.
Strong experience in backend development and API design.
Strong experience in backend development and API design.
1+ years of data analytics or automation experience. Knowledge of SQL, data pipelines, and Excel at a moderate level.

jobDescription: 1+ years of data analytics or automation experience
Knowledge of data pipelining and extraction using SQL
Knowledge of SQL and Excel at a moderate or advanced level

description: Strong experience in backend development and API design.
Strong experience in backend development and API design.
Strong experience in backend development and API design.
